PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-07312024-06-18PWGSC
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisAppointment of ANDRÉ HUDON of Notre-Dame-de-l'Île-Perrot, Quebec, to be Chairperson of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
AttachmentsAttachment
